magpie.data.utilities.splitters

Class ClustererSplitter

  • java.lang.Object
    • magpie.data.utilities.splitters.BaseDatasetSplitter
      • magpie.data.utilities.splitters.ClustererSplitter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, Commandable, Options, Printable

    public class ClustererSplitter
extends BaseDatasetSplitter
    Split data based using unsupervised learning. Uses a BaseClusterer to label each entry's membership in a certain cluster. User can either provide an untrained clusterer and have the splitter train it, or provide a trained clusterer and use as-is.

    Usage: $<clusterer>
    clusterer: Data will be spit based on clusters produced by this BaseClusterer

    See Also:
    BaseClusterer, Serialized Form
